channel.title: The Skeptics' Guide to the Universe
channel.description: The Skeptics' Guide to the Universe is a weekly Podcast talkshow discussing the latest news and topics from the world of the paranormal, fringe science, and controversial claims from a scientific point of view. -The Skeptics' Guide to the Universe: Your escape to reality -Produced by the New England Skeptical Society in association with the James Randi Educational Foundation(JREF) : http://www.theness.com
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Steven Novella
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your Escape to Reality
